title: Mirror, mirror: girls, self esteem & physical activity
creator_credit: John Gall, Gabrielle Kelly and Adelaide College of TAFE
brief_description: A program for students, parents and teachers on factors affecting the participation of girls and women in physical activity - for example, self esteem, body image, expectations and modelling.
